author: Simon Difford
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, "Sparkling grapefruit water adds an unexpected pop to the Flamingo Park Margarita created by Tyler Kitzman of Miami. Patrón Reposado grounds the Margarita of the Year contender in earthy oak notes while a spicy rim gives it the heat one would expect from South Beach."
name: Flamingo Park Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE spirits, agave syrup and lime juice with ice
Rim a footed highball glass with the tajin/sea salt/black pepper mixture
Strain onto fresh ice in the glass
Top with grapefruit sparkling water and stir to combine
Special ingredient #2: Tajîn/sea salt/black pepper rim - 2 parts tajin, 1 part Maldon sea salt, 1 part black pepper
